headline.main: Fashion Forward Flight Attendants Hit the Runway at Russia Airport
headline.print_headline: Fashion Forward Flight Attendants Hit the Runway at Russia Airport

docs.snippet: Flights attendants from various international airlines hit the runway at Moscow's Domodedovo airport on Tuesday -- but on a catwalk to showcase how fashion influences their uniforms....
docs.lead_paragraph: Flights attendants from various international airlines hit the runway at Moscow's Domodedovo airport on Tuesday -- but on a catwalk to showcase how fashion influences their uniforms.

headline.main: Britain's May Tells Merkel and Hollande She Needs Time Before Brexit Talks
headline.print_headline: Britain's May Tells Merkel and Hollande She Needs Time Before Brexit Talks

docs.snippet: British Prime Minister Theresa May said she had told German Chancellor Angela Merkel and French President Francois Hollande on Wednesday that her government would need time before beginning talks on Britain's exit from the European Union....
docs.lead_paragraph: British Prime Minister Theresa May said she had told German Chancellor Angela Merkel and French President Francois Hollande on Wednesday that her government would need time before beginning talks on Britain's exit from the European Union.

headline.main: Parent of Taco Bell, KFC, Pizza Hut Tops 2Q Profit Forecasts
headline.print_headline: Parent of Taco Bell, KFC, Pizza Hut Tops 2Q Profit Forecasts

docs.snippet: Yum Brands Inc. shares jumped in extended trading Wednesday after the parent company of Taco Bell, KFC and Pizza Hut reported a better-than-expected profit for its second quarter despite soft sales at some of its brands....
docs.lead_paragraph: Yum Brands Inc. shares jumped in extended trading Wednesday after the parent company of Taco Bell, KFC and Pizza Hut reported a better-than-expected profit for its second quarter despite soft sales at some of its brands.

headline.main: U.S. Senate Approves Bill to Upgrade Airport Security
headline.print_headline: U.S. Senate Approves Bill to Upgrade Airport Security

docs.snippet: The U.S. Senate on Wednesday approved a bill that would upgrade security at U.S. airports in the aftermath of the Brussels and Istanbul attacks while extending funds for the Federal Aviation Administration for another 14 months....
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. Senate on Wednesday approved a bill that would upgrade security at U.S. airports in the aftermath of the Brussels and Istanbul attacks while extending funds for the Federal Aviation Administration for another 14 months.

headline.main: 2 Seal Pups Dive Back Into the Sea After California Rescue
headline.print_headline: 2 Seal Pups Dive Back Into the Sea After California Rescue

docs.snippet: Two 6-month-old elephant seal pups have been released back into the Pacific Ocean after being treated at a rehabilitation center near Los Angeles....
docs.lead_paragraph: Two 6-month-old elephant seal pups have been released back into the Pacific Ocean after being treated at a rehabilitation center near Los Angeles.

headline.main: Feds Propose Railroads Have Plans to Deal With Oil Spills
headline.print_headline: Feds Propose Railroads Have Plans to Deal With Oil Spills

docs.snippet: Railroads hauling crude oil would be required to develop comprehensive plans for dealing with a significant oil spill, including providing detailed information to state and tribal authorities, under a rule proposed Wednesday by the Department of T...
docs.lead_paragraph: Railroads hauling crude oil would be required to develop comprehensive plans for dealing with a significant oil spill, including providing detailed information to state and tribal authorities, under a rule proposed Wednesday by the Department of Transportation.

headline.main: All Blacks Flanker Savea Extends Hurricanes Deal Until 2018
headline.print_headline: All Blacks Flanker Savea Extends Hurricanes Deal Until 2018

headline.main: Former Oregon Governor's Personal Emails Ordered Withheld From Investigators
headline.print_headline: Former Oregon Governor's Personal Emails Ordered Withheld From Investigators

docs.snippet: A U.S. appeals court ruled on Wednesday that former Oregon Governor John Kitzhaber's personal emails could be withheld from an investigation into whether he used his position to benefit his fiancée....

headline.main: U.S. in Front of Queue for Britain, Says New Foreign Minister Johnson
headline.print_headline: U.S. in Front of Queue for Britain, Says New Foreign Minister Johnson
